body_html:
@soumith I also sent an email to Felix Abecassis from NVIDIA and told him about this issue and asked him if he thinks the updates on CuDNN might be causing this. This is his reply:

The versions of cuBLAS and cuDNN for CUDA 9.0 were updated, but I think that's all. These are the only potential culprits I see on the image side.

I think what he means by image side is the Docker image.
